name: mi air purifier 3h
description:
Product Features:
• 380 m³/h PM CADR
• True HEPA filter
• High-precision laser PM sensor
• OLED touch screen display
• APP+AI smart voice control
• A4 paper sized footprint

Product Specifications:
• External Dimension: 240 x 240 x 520mm
• Net Weight: Approximate 4.8kg
• Effective Area: 26 to 45m²
• Filter Lifetime: 6 to 12 month
• Power Cord Length: 1.5m
• Wi-Fi Connectivity: IEEE 802.8 b/g/n 2.4GHz

Package Contents:
• Mi Air Purifier 3H x1
• HEPA Filter x1
• User Manual x1
• Power Cord x1
